title: MR.SIGA Toilet Bowl Brush and Holder for Bathroom, Black, 2 Pack
features: DURABLE CONSTRUCTION - Durable and dense PP fibers create long lasting bristles for strong cleaning ability but won't scratch the toilet bowl, leaves your toilet bowl spotless and sanitary.

EFFICIENT CLEANING - Strong bristles are not easy to get deformed, they are economical and practical, the dense nylon bristles offers thorough and deep cleaning under-rim area and those hard-to-reach corners. Water easily drips off bristles into bottom of holder, brings you a refreshing cleaning experience.

ELEGANT & STYLISH DESIGN - Simple and elegant design works for any bathroom, it's a must-have accessory for your bathroom cleaning. Compact space saving design keeps your toilet brush hidden and provides a sanitary storage.

ANTI-SPLASH LID - The one-piece toilet brush handle and lid protects your hand from water and cleaning solutions, keep your hands dry and away from dirt. After finishing cleaning, just put the toilet brush on the holder and it's ideal for storing the brush out of sight.

MR.SIGA's mission: Make your housework easier, and make the world cleaner. Should you have any questions about the product or after-sale service, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here for support and advice!
